title: His Royal Love-Child
description: The prince and his pregnant mistress...Danette Michaels knew that when she became Principe Marcello Scorsolini's secret mistress there would be no marriage, no future and no public acknowledgment. At the time it was enough.But Danette can't be Marcello's secret any longer. She wants him, all or nothing -- even if it means their affair is over.Until a pregnancy test changes the rules forever....
author: Lucy Monroe
